info.title: Swiss QR Web Service
info.description: A web service that can be used to generate and read Swiss QR codes.

post.summary: Generates a new QR code with the information provided via POST.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of generated invoice. Can either be A4_PORTRAIT_SHEET, QR_BILL_ONLY, QR_BILL_WITH_HORIZONTAL_LINE or QR_CODE_ONLY.

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: File format of the resulting QR code (PNG, PDF or SVG). Defaults to PNG.

parameters.name: width
parameters.description: Width of the resulting QR code in mm. Default depending on type.

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: Height of the resulting QR code in mm. Default depending on type.

parameters.name: resolution
parameters.description: Resolution of the resulting QR code in mm. Defaults to 150.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language of the generated bill. Options are DE, FR, IT or EN. Defaults to EN.

get.summary: Generates a new QR code with the information provided via GET.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Type of generated invoice. Can either be A4_PORTRAIT_SHEET, QR_BILL_ONLY, QR_BILL_WITH_HORIZONTAL_LINE or QR_CODE_ONLY.

parameters.name: amount
parameters.description: Amount to be printed on the invoice.

parameters.name: account
parameters.description: Account number to be printed on the invoice.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: Currency of the amount printed on the invoice.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: Message to be printed on the invoice.

parameters.name: billInformation
parameters.description: Bill information to be printed on the invoice.

parameters.name: reference
parameters.description: Currency of the amount printed on the invoice

parameters.name: debtor_name
parameters.description: Name of the debtor to be printed on the invoice

parameters.name: debtor_country_code
parameters.description: Country of the debtor to be printed on the invoice

parameters.name: debtor_address_line_1
parameters.description: Address line 1 of the debtor to be printed on the invoice

parameters.name: debtor_address_line_2
parameters.description: Address line 2 of the debtor to be printed on the invoice

parameters.name: creditor_name
parameters.description: Name of the creditor to be printed on the invoice

parameters.name: creditor_country_code
parameters.description: Country of the creditor to be printed on the invoice

parameters.name: creditor_address_line_1
parameters.description: Address line 1 of the creditor to be printed on the invoice

parameters.name: creditor_address_line_2
parameters.description: Address line 2 of the creditor to be printed on the invoice

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language of the generated bill. Options are DE, FR, IT or EN. Defaults to EN.

post.summary: Scans a swiss QR code with the given information and returns the data it contains.
